ValidationRule.description: If a case management record has its status set to "Duplicate Case" but does not have a related case assigned to it via the Related Case lookup, this validation rule will fire and prevent the record from saving.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Duplicate Case" ),AND( Record_Type_Name__c = "WCA", ISPICKVAL ( Closure_Disposition__c , "Duplicate Case"))) , ISBLANK( Related_Case__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not set a case management record as a duplicate without assigning it to another existing case via the Related Case field.
